排隊機制雖然有改動意圖讓遊戲公平性提升，但就遊玩體驗性來說根本趨近於零，原因在於根本排不到人，或是需要花大量時間在大廳排隊等待其他玩家進入隊伍，R20的鬼如果沒有在賽季更新馬上開始排隊爬牌的話，過不到一個禮拜你就沒有機會玩鬼；而求生者也差不多，r20的話還算好排，但升到R12 10之類的會遇到夜間時段也得花個10多分鐘排隊才能進入遊戲的窘境。

This game is (in my opinion) the best Killer VS Survivor type game in its genre. However, occasionally this game does have it's quirks that makes it seems that the game can be less fun at times but if you can look past that and are just trying to have fun as a Killer (someone who hunts 4 players to stop them from escaping) or a survivor (someone trying to survive and escape) then you'll have a great time. On a positive note, the devs are always working on updates that adds both new killers and survivors meanwhile finding a balance in the meta for them. So new content gets added every now and then.
El precio no va de acorde a lo que ofrece el juego.
Great game, horrible matchmaking

An absolutely addictive survival horror. Playing killer is also thrilling! Queue times could be shorter in non peak-times and some killers hit boxes could be nerfed but this game is still very fun!

*EDIT*
I'm nearing 3000 hours into the game now, I can still highly recommend this more so to my first review when I barely had decent playtime in the game. The Devs are constantly improving the game graphically (with new updates to a lot of maps as well as items), adding more characters and cosmetics, more challenges & listening to the community with ongoing bugs and issues. The team is very involved with the community doing streams on twitch both dev related and community fun. Very active on twitter and feels more intimate than bigger game companies. 
I've encouraged many friends to play this and so far all have thoroughly enjoyed it and still play! I've also met many new friends in-game & on socials related to DBD. The game does have its cons as do all games but, with how the team handles issues and bugs/complaints, most of the cons do get the attention they need.
 
Cons:
- Queue times with Cross Play switched off are far too long.
- Nothing really happens when you report toxic or abusive players
- Cosmetics are too expensive for what they are - more alternatives and better price scaling for Cells & Shards could be changed as well as more cosmetics in general with more ways to get earn them
- Maps are too dark - most maps feel too dark even with brightness all the way up & monitor all the way up. Having to change settings to Med or Low just to see better even on the newly updated maps.
- Many perks and add - ons need a buff/ nurf or just removed (Why have Premonition??)
- DC penalty should be re assessed for cases of campers or rage-quitters. Similarly, killers who face camp should be punished via scoring heavily. (obviously it is a strategy when Killers are losing the gens but maybe find some compromise for/against survivors too)
- MANY BUGS/STUTTERS/LATENCY ISSUES - seems to be more every time there's a patch or update?!

PROS:
+ Very open to meeting new friends in-game & via socials
+ Games feel rewarding when played balanced on both sides (non camping tunnel killers or gen rushers)
+ Customisation/ outfits is great (however desiring new and plenty more variety)
+ BP gaining system and lock on 1 million encourages to play often and invest - updated now to over-cap when earning up to 1 mil per rank reset.
+ Steam achievements are fun and some are rather difficult - more rewarding.
+ New updates are making the game still playable & enjoyable over time (minus the bugs)
+ Playing your fave killers from movie franchises and just playing creative killer powers in general (my fave = The Plague)

So overall, I do still recommend this game. Takes a little time to get used to and there is a toxic behaviour within the community but staying positive and just having fun makes this game enjoyable for hours mostly with friends :)

There's no proper scaling for 4K monitors in game so when I move my mouse around my clicks wont register which is horrible especially when playing killer. The only fix is to set your windows scaling setting to 100% (I normally use 175% for my 4K screen) but then all the icons in game, and on my whole computer OS become very tiny, so skill checks are harder to hit especially against a Doctor. To then fix the tiny scaling I have to set my monitor resolution down to 1920x1080 from the native 3840x2160 res which is a completely obnoxious process to do before and after playing the game.

Katillere buff vermişsiniz deli gibi hızlı koşuyorlar.
Tamir ve sağlık kitlerinin yükünü düşürmüşsünüz hiçbirşey yapamıyoruz.
Oyun kazanamıyorum 50 tane oyun attık oyun kazanılmıyor aşırı derecede katillere buff vermişsiniz.
Buff verdiniz tamam ama en azından kullanılan kitlerin yükünü neden düşürdünüz.
Oyun yapımcılarına sesleniyorum oyunun dengeleyin katiller çok önde ve range alanları çok geniş.
Palet lerden ve penecere lerden atlarken darbe yiyoruz bu olmaması gerekiyor havada darbe vuruyorlar ve çok fazla hit vuruyorlar.
Acil olarak denge gelmesi gerekiyor.

Şimdi, oyunu fazla bir beklenti ile almamıştım ancak çok sarmaya başladı. Evet ara sıra ping sorunları veya eşleştirme zamanının fazla olması ( max 8 dk) gibi ancak kesinlikle beklemeye değer. oyunda ek olarak karakter satın almak isterseniz yaklaşık olarak tanesi 10 tl. Oyunu normal olarak almanızı tavsiye ederim. İndirim olacaktır bekleyebilirsiniz. her karakterin kendine has özellikleri var bu bir artı. biraz pay for win gibi gözüksede karakterlerin levelleri çok fark yaratıyor. yani emek ve oyunda kasmak. En az 200 saat oynamalık bir oyun şiddetle tavsiye ederim.

Excelente; como cualquier juego, no es perfecto, y como cualquier juego online encontrarás ocasionalmente alguna persona que solo quiere arruinar la diversión.
[actualización] Sigo Recomendando el juego, pero advierto que hace falta una actitud mental muy especifica para jugarlo o terminarás furioso.
Aunque la comunidad tiene mala fama (Y por buenas razones), hay que destacar la enorme cantidad de jugadores entrañables que solo buscan pasar un buen rato. Estos compensan con creces a los otros.
Además...AL JUEGO LE VENDRÍA GENIAL UN WORKSHOP EN STEAM.

Tek başına veya arkadaşlarla oynaması keyifli bir oyun.

Bir sürü farklı map, survivor ve katiller var. Hepsinin farklı ve puanlarla açılabilen yetenekleri var.
Survivorken amaç 5 adet jeneratörü tamir edip elektrikle açılabilen kapıya güç vererek haritadan kaçmak; katilken de kaçmadan herkesi kancaya asarak kurban etmek. 

Farklı DLC'lerde farklı mapler, survibor ve killer'lar mevcut. 

Tavsiye ediyorum kesinlikle.
